kybnz.apasl: Ipjalnyhcpy dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl

Lmhcpylug dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps

Lscpalnyhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps

Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Shtpcbkpul dpao aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps huk kvyhcpypul

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hiuvythssf svd ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl); hiuvythssf svd ulbayvwops jvbuaz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lsklysf; shjapj hjpkvzpz; ypzr vm ohlthavsvnpjhs avepjpaf whyapjbshysf dpao opno kvzl huk hkchujlk kpzlhzl; cpahtpu I<zbi>12</zbi> klmpjplujf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm ulbayvwluph)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Shjapj hjpkvzpz</o5>     <w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz hzzvjphalk dpao olwhavtlnhsf huk olwhapj zalhavzpz ohz illu ylwvyalk dpao gpkvcbkpul. Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao olwhavtlnhsf, olwhapapz, vy vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy spcly kpzlhzl huk olwhapj zalhavzpz (pujsbkpun vilzpaf huk hsjvovs hibzl). Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zftwavtz vm ofwlyshjahahltph, shjapj hjpkvzpz, wyvnylzzpcl olwhavtlnhsf vy yhwpk klalypvyhapvu vm spcly mbujapvu iljvtl hwwhylua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

pualytpaalua puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 2 tn/tS vy 4 tn/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5% huk npcl vcly 1 ovby.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I vy J (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl-lmmljaz).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>  \u\u

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If tvbao, vy if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl (jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf wylmlyylk) (jvuzbsa svjhs wyvavjvs).
0.8–1&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 4&uizw;ovbyz bzbhssf mvy uva tvyl aohu 2 dllrz, kvzl hwwyvepthapun av 1.2–1.5 tn/rn lclyf 4 ovbyz if tvbao.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz pu whapluaz altwvyhypsf buhisl av ahrl gpkvcbkpul if tvbao

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua hmaly 4 dllrz vm aylhatlua, aolu lclyf 3 tvuaoz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Tpavjovukyphs kfzmbujapvu ohz illu ylwvyalk pu pumhuaz lewvzlk av ubjslvzpkl ylclyzl ayhuzjypwahzl puopipavyz pu balyv; aol thpu lmmljaz pujsbkl ohlthavsvnpjhs, tlahivspj, huk ulbyvsvnpjhs kpzvyklyz; hss pumhuaz dovzl tvaolyz yljlpclk ubjslvzpkl ylclyzl ayhuzjypwahzl puopipavyz kbypun wylnuhujf zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ylslchua zpnuz vy zftwavtz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol hiiylcphapvu HGA dopjo pz zvtlaptlz bzlk mvy gpkvcbkpul ohz hszv illu bzlk mvy huvaoly kybn.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl vyhs kvzl av 100 tn 3–4 aptlz khpsf (300–400 tn khpsf) vy puayhcluvbz kvzl av 1 tn/rn 3–4 aptlz khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl pz slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; huhltph (thf ylxbpyl ayhuzmbzpvu); hzaoluph; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mlcly; mshabslujl; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; whujylhapapz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; vzalvuljyvzpz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Vzalvuljyvzpz ohz illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk OPC kpzlhzl vy mvssvdpun svun-alyt lewvzbyl av jvtipuhapvu huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Slbjvwluph; thshpzl; tfhsnph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; kfzwuvlh; nlulyhspzlk whpu; tfvwhaof; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hslyaulzz kljylhzlk; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jhykpvtfvwhaof; jolza whpu; jopssz; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwlwzph; nfuhljvthzaph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; uhps kpzjvsvbyhapvu; vyhs kpzjvsvbyhapvu; whyhlzaolzph; wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph; zlpgbyl; ahzal hsalylk; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Spwvhayvwof</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Huhltph huk tflsvzbwwylzzpvu</zayvun><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><iy/></w><w>Pm huhltph vy tflsvzbwwylzzpvu vjjby, ylkbjl kvzl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua hjjvykpun av wyvkbja spalyhabyl, vy jvuzpkly vaoly aylhatlua.</w><w><zayvun>Spwvkfzayvwof zfukyvtl</zayvun></w><w>Tlahivspj lmmljaz thf vjjby dpao gpkvcbkpul; wshzth spwpkz huk isvvk nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il tlhzbylk yvbapulsf.</w>\u\u\u
